info.task: navigate backwards out of the breadcrumb navigation landmark
info.title: Navigate backwards out of the Breadcrumb navigation landmark

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstBreadcrumbLink
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link
testPageDocument.getElementById('breadcrumb1').focus();

user: With focus on the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link, navigate to the 'Navigate forwards from here' link.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices' link, navigate to the 'Navigate forwards from here' link.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name 'Navigate forwards from here' is conveyed
